mapper.select: select * from( select brandGroup.id, brandGroup.entry_pic, brandGroup.poster_pic, brandGroup.name from bu_seckill_brand_group brandGroup, bu_seckill_brand_group_product sbgp, bu_single_product_activity single, bu_product pro where brandGroup.id = sbgp.seckill_brand_group_id and sbgp.single_product_activity_id = single.id and single.product_id = pro.id and single.seckill_type = #{seckillType} and pro.status = '1' and pro.audit_status = '2' and brandGroup.del_flag = '0' and sbgp.del_flag = '0' and single.del_flag = '0' and brandGroup.status = '1' and brandGroup.begin_time = FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginTime}) order by brandGroup.id) apiA group by apiA.id having count(1) >= #{havingBy} limit #{currentPage} ,#{pageSize}
